mapper.insert: insert into gen_table (id, table_name, table_comment, class_name, tpl_category, package_name, module_name, business_name, function_name, function_author, options, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remark) values (#{id}, #{tableName}, #{tableComment}, #{className}, #{tplCategory}, #{packageName}, #{moduleName}, #{businessName}, #{functionName}, #{functionAuthor}, #{options}, #{createBy}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy}, #{updateDate}, #{remark})
mapper.update: update gen_table set table_name = #{tableName}, table_comment = #{tableComment}, class_name = #{className}, tpl_category = #{tplCategory}, package_name = #{packageName}, module_name = #{moduleName}, business_name = #{businessName}, function_name = #{functionName}, function_author = #{functionAuthor}, options = #{options}, create_by = #{createBy}, create_date = #{createDate}, update_by = #{updateBy}, update_date = #{updateDate}, remark = #{remark} where id = #{id}
mapper.select: select id, table_name, table_comment, class_name, tpl_category, package_name, module_name, business_name, function_name, function_author, options, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remark from gen_table where id = #{id}

select id, table_name, table_comment, class_name, tpl_category, package_name, module_name, business_name, function_name, function_author, options, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remark from gen_table
